name: Joe's Garden
description:
Inspiration for this game was Community Game Jam with theme: the game is a liar

Joe has a huge garden and a lovely wife. Joe wants to give his wife all her favorite flowers from his garden for her birthday. But Joe's memory is not as good as it used to be. Help him find the correct flowers!

Controls: space (for menus) and mouse

Tools used: Piskel / Leshy SFMaker / Soundtrap
